All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMessageListener  
    AlreadyConnectedException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to establish a connect between two Nodes that already have an established connection.
    AsyncOracle  
    BBInetSocketAddress  
    ConnectionNotEstablishedException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to communicate with a Node with which it has no established connection (yet, probably)
    Constants
    Simple interface for storing static and constant values that can be used throughout the implementation
    GlobalSettings
    This interface just stores important settings that are used throughout the whole protocol implementation It serves as a kind of utility to avoid inconsistencies
    IllegalSettingChangeException  
    InvalidMessageTypeException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to instantiate a Message with a type that is not correct (not present in MessageDecoder's type list
    Message
    This class represents a Message that is sent between nodes of the network utilizing this protocol.
    MessageDecoder
    This class is responsible for storing some important, static information about the possible Message types, and also for decoding incoming Messages with a type that is not correct (not present in MessageDecoder's type list
    MessageDecoder.MessageType
    This enum contains all types of Messages, with their respective names.
    MessageHasNoDestinationException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to send a Message through the network, but said Message has no defined destination
    MessageListener  
    MessageMetadata
    This class stores information about a Message's metadata.
    MessageRouter  
    MessageRouter.MessageRoutingKey  
    MessageTooLargeException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to create a Message whose total size in bytes exceeds that which is defined in GlobalSettings
    Node  
    NullMessageException
    Exception that is thrown when the program tries to process (decode, encode, etc) a Message object that is either null or empty (no metadata, no data)
    RandomList<E>  
    RTTOracle  
    SingletonIsNullException  
    TCP  
    XBotNode
    To know more about the XBot protocol, read http://asc.di.fct.unl.pt/~jleitao/pdf/srds09-leitao.pdf
    XBotRound  
    XBotRound.Role  
    XBotRoundPool  
    XBotSettings
    This interface just stores important settings that are associated with the XBot protocol, like the size of the Node's views and certain timeouts
